pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The cauldron can be used to create or imbue items with magical properties. If a suitable combination of ingredients is thrown into the cauldron, the creation process will begin automatically. Use $(l:brewing/rituals#risks_and_power)ritual circles$(/l) to reduce power costs!
